description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the NTFS elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-21446), apply the related update packages as detailed below:

1. Download the relevant update package for your Windows version from the links provided.
2. Install the update to ensure the vulnerability is addressed.
3. Restart your system after the installation to validate the changes.

**Details**:
- This update resolves a security issue related to sensitive data storage in improperly locked memory, preventing potential unauthorized elevation of privileges.
- For specific builds, ensure compatibility with:
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22631.3296 (KB5035853)
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.19045.4170 (KB5035845)
- Update packages can be accessed at:
  - [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)
  - [KB5035858](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035858)
  - [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
  - [KB5035854](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035854).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running a supported version of Windows.
- Backup critical data before proceeding to install updates.
